phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta visited Nean, the town where Rebecca and her siblings lived,
but it turned out to be where Gauche's beloved little sister Marie lived, as well.
Get away from her this instant, you trash!
That night, a certain incident struck Nean.
That is not even your house!
When did it pile up so much?
It is not even the season for that yet.
What do you two think you are doing?!
Luca, Marco, where could you have gone at this hour?
Guess they did not just go out to pee
I will never let you marry my sister.
Now's not the time for that!
There is nothing more important than Marie, damn it!
Hey, what the heck's going on in this town?
Why is it snowing this time of year?
I-I just happened to be in the area.
She is one of my Magic Knight buddies.
And Noelle, this is my friend Rebecca.
I saw a whole bunch of kids go up to the mountains earlier.
Do you guys have some festival this late at night?
I am going to make you bleed.
I feel magical power in this snow.
There is magic at work here.
and that only affects children whose magic has not matured.
A number of ours were taken, too.
What do they mean to do, taking all these children?
Hey, old hag, what do you mean, taken?
Do not tell me Marie was, too!
Sadly, that is what I am saying.
How could you let that happen, you stupid old hag?!
So quick to resort to violence...
If you want to hit me, go ahead.
But that will not bring back the children.
It will not bring back Marie.
But I will not feel better until I do!
Just cool down a little, okay?
A Magic Knight needs to stay calm at all times.
That hurt, you stupid little brat!
Now's not the time for this!
We need to find some clues!
As if it will be that easy!
The magic mirror that I have Marie keep with her at all times...
I would not be able to transmit to it because of this snow,
but if I search for the mana in that mirror...
I should be able to figure out where she is.
I may have figured that out, but I am still killing you.
I will kill you while giving thanks.
I am going to get the kids from the church and the town back.
Old Sister, leave this to us.
As much as it pains me to say it, this old hag will be useful.
She is not just an ordinary old lady?
I am not going to lose to you young'uns just yet.
Marco's an idiot and Luca's too headstrong, so I am worried about them...
If something were to happen to them...
Get a hold of yourself, Rebecca!
I will get them back, no matter what!
They will laugh at you if you are all panicky when we get back.
You cannot fly on your own either, can you?
Do you want to dangle, like him?
The town might be attacked again.
And could you report back to the Magic Knights?
I am counting on you, Asta!
I have to stay behind with her?
I am so happy I made so many friends.
Make sure you stay good boys and girls with the spell I am using.
Did he put a spell on everyone?
Come to think of it, Brother did say that
the mirror he gave me would protect me from magic a little.
Hang on to this mirror as if it were me.
Looks like my spell on you has been broken.
We cannot be friends if you will not be a good girl and stay under my spell.
Putting someone under a spell and making them do what you say
does not make them a real friend.
How could you say something so cruel?
A friend would never say that!
I told you not to damage the goods.
She is the prize this time.
Imagine having that much magic at her age!
Having this many brats means a big payday!
That brat barely has any magic.
I told you to only bring ones with a lot of magic, Neige!
Just going to have to throw trash like this away.
Let us draw the magic out of you.
These enemies must possess powerful magic.
We, the Magic Knights, will find all the kids.
Asta and Gauche will bring them all back soon.
S-Stupidsta and Gauche will fix that when they get back, too.
We should do what we can to fix it up for now.
Oh, I need to contact the other Magic Knights.
Have not I seen you before?
It is not my main job, but Captain Jack ordered me to help out here.
I have been doing so good lately that they are letting me take a break from all the battles.
Someone made this snow fall on the town using magic
so they could kidnap all the kids here!
You should hurry up and contact the Magic Knights.
That is what I am doing right now!
There is nothing to worry about anymore!
Somehow, I am even more worried now.
That must be where all the abducted children are!
Gauche, could you let me down a sec?
I do not care about anyone besides Marie.
If you want to go, then jump off.
How can you call yourself a Magic Knight?!
I do not care what happens to the others, as long as I can protect Marie.
On the day that I, a former prisoner, joined the Black Bulls, the captain told me...
You can just protect whoever you want to protect.
And that is exactly what I will be doing.
He is covered in wounds, and he is frostbitten.
He is under a spell and still unconscious.
Flame Recovery Magic: Sacred Healing Light.
We have to go save your sister and the other kids.
Can you wait in that cave by yourself?
You are a man, too, are not you?
Just this once, I will let you borrow my Black Bulls robe!
As long as you have this on, you will be fine!
It is got Magic Knight courage in it, after all!
You can wait until we get back, right?
I am only letting you borrow it!
You are going to give it back to me later!
You will give it back, right?
And do not get any snot on it!
All right, we have to hurry.
I am worried about the others.
It is like a damn maze in here.
But the mana's getting stronger and stronger.
Just wait a little longer, Marie.
I am going to squeeze every last drop of magic out of you brats!
Are we going to use our prize next?
I am going to make a fortune off of your magic.
What did you do to Marie, you bastards?!
He has a Magic Knight robe on!
How did they find us so quickly?
Wh-What the heck is that spell?!
I-I cannot hit him at all!
H-Hurry up and use a different spell, you oaf!
Defeating one or two will not make a difference!
Neige can keep creating an infinite number of these guys!
This is not what we were told about.
I only accepted this job because we were told that
it would just be draining brats of their magic!
What is the deal with this guy's magic?!
There has to be some way!
Move an inch, and see what happens to her!
What are you going to do
if I get annoyed and put a little too much strength into my grip?
Neige, beat him to a pulp
How dare you throw something so dangerous?!
What if it had hit Marie?!
More importantly, what if you had hit Marie?!
There is no way I would ever hit her.
My love for Marie is too great.
These children have had their magic sucked out of them.
If left like this, they may never be able to use magic again.
That man was saying how it would be worth a lot of money.
How could you do something so cruel?
We had enough on our hands with that monster of a guy,
but now that his friends have shown up, we do not stand a chance!
He does not have any magic at all!
I have never seen trash like you!
Now that I take a closer look,
you are just some peon that does not even have a Magic Knight's robe!
Neige, you take care of that sister complex freak.
I guess I will just have to take care of this peon myself.
I am sure Asta and the others will bring them back safely.
Why do not we do a quiz to lighten the mood?
Becoming the Wizard King someday... I think.
I really do not want to lose!
Next time, I get to be the star again!
I will show you the true bah-ha!
